CustomField.description: If the ticket is for the cancellation of entire customer that is parent (Bill-To) and all child accounts(Ship-To) then select "All Ship-to Locations". If the ticket is for the cancellation of single location then select "Sing Ship-To Location"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the ticket is for the cancellation of entire customer that is parent (Bill-To) and all child accounts(Ship-To) then select "All Ship-to Locations". If the ticket is for the cancellation of single location then select "Sing Ship-To Location"
CustomField.label: Cancellation Applies To
